name: vicons
description: SVG Vue components integrated from [`fluentui-system-icons`](https://github.com/microsoft/fluentui-system-icons) and [`ionicons`](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionicons).

scripts.build: npm run clean && node scripts/generate.js && npm run lint
scripts.build:site: rm -rf site && esbuild demo/index.js --bundle --splitting --outdir=site --format=esm --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' && cp index.html site/index.html
scripts.build:vercel: ./init.sh && npm run build && npm run build:site
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ionicons-v4 && npm run lint:ionicons-v5 && npm run lint:fluent && node scripts/rollup.js

author: 07akioni
